column4: hello! I recently installed ubuntu 8.10 server, then installed kubuntu-desktop-kde3. all working ok, but it seems "user manager" is not intalled. what should I install?
... install ... terminal ... oh wait it is
it seems I am missing some of the system management tools in my kde3.5 on ubuntu 8.10 server install. In particular, I am looking for the "user manager
that gui-fies adduser, etc.. Any ideas of what I should add?
